      • getMapping

        public static DataCluster getMapping()
                              throws FileNotFoundException,
                                     IOException,
                                     org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException
        Get the mapping either internally or from a cached version in phantom's data folder. If it reads it internally, it will also create a cache. DO NOT USE THIS OFTEN (DISK)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - cant find the file
        IOException - shit happens
        org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException - shit happens

      • getTexture

        public static BufferedImage getTexture(String name)
                                throws IOException
        Get the buffered image of the given texture file name. If it cannot be read internally, a cached version will be read from phantom's data folder. If it is read internally, it will be overwritten to the data folder for caching purposes. DO NOT USE THIS OFTEN (DISK)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the texture
        Returns:
        the buffered image
        Throws:
        IOException - shit happens

      • getColor

        public static Color getColor(BufferedImage bu,
                             int x,
                             int y)
        Get the color of a given pixel
        Parameters:
        bu - the buffered image
        x - the x
        y - the y
        Returns:
        the pixel or null

      • getProminentColor

        public static Color getProminentColor(BufferedImage bu)
        Get the prominent color in the entire buffered image ignoring alpha
        Parameters:
        bu - the buffered image
        Returns:
        the prominent color
